name: Whac a mole VR
description:
This is our very first project as a team from our Unreal Engine 4 workshop to make VR games.

Wait for more and better games from us. Hope you like it!

Workshop Direction: Angel Alonso Villicaña Contreras.

Programming: Juan Fernando Escobedo García,

Modeling/Texturing: Jose Fabian Salcedo Estrada.
